summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alleys in Block 16, Plat of Columbia, being the alleys in the block bounced by Hudson Street, Ferdinand Street, 37th Avenue South and Rainier Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9901 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
